description:
Bonney witnesses her father Bartholomew Kuma’s painful memories. Meanwhile at the lab, Shaka notices that their communications and surveillance cameras are being cut off by somebody.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shudder! The Evil Hand Creeping Up on the Laboratory
Frissons d`horreur. Le mal s`infiltre au laboratoire !
Schauder! – Die im Labor heranschleichende Teufelshand
Senritsu! Kenkyuujo e Shinobiyoru Ma no Te
قشعريرة! تدنو اليد الشّرّيرة من المختبر!
戦慄! 研究所へ忍び寄る魔の手
